column4: ï»¿Hello, I'm having problems connecting to a preset wireless net, it takes up to 10 min to connect automatically, hovewever if I do a manual (nm-applet) connect it works in a matter of seconds, anybody able to help?
try using wicd instead of nm-applet. it's worked out much better for me.
I don't think i unistalled it, i just removed it from the toolbar after installing wicd and added a tray icon for wicd.
np. hope it fixes your prob =)
